duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the Site/Service functions supporting a Major Automotive OEM.
Perform daily tests and quality audits to ensure processes are within specifications and provide reports to customer management and staff.
Develop effective account management and service & sales support strategies.
Cultivate new business opportunities and provide outstanding customer service and support commitment.
Apply organizational resources to provide excellent customer and technical support.
Ensure rapid resolution of problems and provide technical and product management support across multiple technology platforms.
Maintain high standards and professional image of the company.

education_certification.credential: BS/BA, preferably business, chemistry, or related fields or equivalent industry experience.
